'''Grace''' was one of the mourners at Pete's funeral party.

==History==
At Pete's funeral, Grace and her brother, [[Matthew]], told Violet a story about how after their father died, their mother didn't tell them about a pain she was having and they figured it was just grief. By the time they noticed, the pancreatic cancer was advanced. She wanted to die at home. The last day of her life, they wanted to take her to the hospital, but Pete reminded them to honor her wishes and he came into the room, which had a calming effect on her. She got to die surrounded by her family and her dogs in her home.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
Her mother died of cancer shortly after the death of her father.
